example_sentence_italian: Voglio impiccare il fantoccio per la scena.
example_sentence_english: I want to hang the dummy for the scene.

example_sentence_italian: Sta impiccando il fantoccio nella scena.
example_sentence_english: He is hanging the dummy in the scene.
They hanged her in the story.
They hanged them in the tale.

example_sentence_italian: Io impiccavo il fantoccio ogni sera.
example_sentence_english: I was hanging the dummy every evening.
